title: London, BL, Add. 17254
Digital Catalogue of Syriac Manuscripts in the British Library
Hymns of Severus, etc., in number 310 (ܫܝ), each marked with a letter denoting its tone.
Arranged according to the eight tones.
Third tone.
Fourth.
Fifth.
Sixth.
Seventh.
Eighth.
Epiphany.
Lent.
Miracles.
Palm Sunday.
Passion Week.
Resurrection.
Of Baptism.
Ascension.
Pentecost.
holy Church.
reception of bishops.
Supplicatory hymns, ascribed to Rabulas of Edessa, Maruthas of Tagrit, and Ephraim.
Similar hymns of the Resurrection, arranged according to the eight tones.
syrTitle: ܫܠܡ ܡ̈ܥܢܝܬܐ ܕܩܕܝܫܐ ܡܪܝ ܣܐܘܝܪܐ ܘܕܐܢܫ̈ܝܢ ܐܚܪ̈ܢܐ ܡܫ̣ܡܠܝܐܝܬ ܘܡܛܟܣܐܝܬ ܕܠܐ ܒܘܨܪ.
author: Severus
Rabulas of Edessa
